name: GHXSTSHIP Target Personas & Top Workflows
description: Target personas and top 20 requested automation workflows for Zapier integration

ops.name: Operations Manager
ops.description: Manages day-to-day operations across production, logistics, and crew

finance.name: Finance Director
finance.description: Oversees financial operations, budgeting, and reporting

marketing.name: Marketing Manager
marketing.description: Drives event promotion, audience engagement, and brand growth
pain_points: Delayed response to ticket sales trends

sales.name: Sales Representative
sales.description: Manages client relationships and deal pipeline

top_20_workflows.name: New Ticket Buyer Welcome
top_20_workflows.description: Welcome new ticket buyers with personalized email and notify sales team

top_20_workflows.name: Deal Stage Change Alert
top_20_workflows.description: Notify team and sync CRM when deal progresses

top_20_workflows.name: Crew Assignment Notification
top_20_workflows.description: Multi-channel notification when crew is assigned to project

top_20_workflows.name: Invoice Payment Notification
top_20_workflows.description: Notify finance team and sync accounting when invoice is paid

top_20_workflows.name: Equipment Maintenance Alert
top_20_workflows.description: Create maintenance ticket and alert team when equipment service is due

top_20_workflows.name: Abandoned Cart Recovery
top_20_workflows.description: Trigger recovery email sequence and retargeting for abandoned carts

top_20_workflows.name: Expense Approval Routing
top_20_workflows.description: Route expense for approval based on amount and category

top_20_workflows.name: Incident Escalation
top_20_workflows.description: Escalate production incidents to on-call team

top_20_workflows.name: VIP Upgrade Notification
top_20_workflows.description: Update customer profiles and notify team when customer becomes VIP

top_20_workflows.name: Deal Won Celebration
top_20_workflows.description: Celebrate deal wins with team notification and CRM update

top_20_workflows.name: Compliance Reminder
top_20_workflows.description: Remind team members about expiring certifications

top_20_workflows.name: Event Reminder Campaign
top_20_workflows.description: Send event reminders to ticket holders

top_20_workflows.name: Budget Variance Alert
top_20_workflows.description: Alert stakeholders when budget variance exceeds threshold

top_20_workflows.name: Schedule Change Broadcast
top_20_workflows.description: Broadcast schedule changes to affected crew members

top_20_workflows.name: Follow-up Reminder
top_20_workflows.description: Remind sales reps about pending follow-ups

top_20_workflows.name: Post-Event Survey
top_20_workflows.description: Send satisfaction survey to attendees after event

top_20_workflows.name: Vendor Payment Reminder
top_20_workflows.description: Remind AP team about upcoming vendor payments

top_20_workflows.name: Proposal Sent Notification
top_20_workflows.description: Notify team when proposal is sent to prospect

top_20_workflows.name: Revenue Milestone Tracking
top_20_workflows.description: Track and celebrate revenue milestones

top_20_workflows.name: Renewal Approaching Alert
top_20_workflows.description: Alert account managers about upcoming contract renewals
